about.title: Who am I?
about.description: I am a passionate programmer with extensive experience in web development, both on the frontend and backend. Throughout my journey, I have honed my skills in various programming languages and technologies. However, my true fascination lies in the realm of artificial intelligence. Specifically, I have a deep interest in machine learning, particularly deep learning techniques. Additionally, I possess expertise in computer vision and digital image processing. With a strong foundation and a curious mind, I am constantly seeking new challenges to further expand my knowledge and skills in everything related to programming.
